ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: Indonesia, Moluccas, Ambon, Leitimur, Ambon Bay, outer bay, Amahusa; depth 15 m; scuba diving; seaven from sand; 1.xii.1990; collected by A. Fortuin.
Indonesia, Moluccas, Ambon, Leitimur, Cape Nusaniwe; depth ca. 5 m; scuba diving; from Xenidae; 12.xi.1990; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 618: Seychelles, Mahé, NE coast, North East Point; 04°35'S 55°28'E; depth 12 m; reef flat, exposed reef slope with sparse coral cover merging into sandy bottom; scuba diving; on white gorgonian; 14.xii.1992; coll. by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:Locality: just south of Pointe au Sel and Ile Souris
ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: NIOP-E, Sta. 603: Seychelles, Mahé, SE coast, just S of Pointe au Sel and Ile Souris; 04°44'S 55°32'E; depth1 m, sandy reef flat with isolated granitic rock and intertidal beachrock; snorkeling; between branches of Pocillopora damicornis;7.xii.1992.

NIOP-E, Sta. 753: Seychelles, St Joseph atoll, NW rim; 5°24'S 53°19'E; reef slope; depth 6 m; scuba diving; on holothurian (Stichopodidae), Thelenota ananas (Jaeger, 1833) and an other Holothuriid; 26.xi.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 792: Seychelles, St François atoll, W rim; 7°05'S 52°44'E; outer slope; depth 25 m; scuba-diving; on holothurian (Stichopodidae), Thelenota ananas (Jaeger, 1833); 5/6.i.1993; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
NIOP-E, Sta. 786: Seychelles, Alphonse atoll, NW edge; 7°00'S 52°43'E; steep slope, depth 5 m; scuba diving, on Cryptodendrum adhesivum; 3.i.1993; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:ProvinceState: Mahé; SE coast; off Ile Souris
ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: NIOP-E, Sta. 741: Seychelles, Mahé, SE coast, Anse Royale bay, off Ile Souris;4°44'S 55°32'E; outside of reef barier, depth: to 10 m; scuba diving; on sea anemone; 24.XII.1992.
NIOP-E, Sta. 774: Seychelles, Desroches atoll, SW rim; 5°43'S 53°37'E; outer reef slope, depth: 15 m; on thread-like antipatharian host; scuba diving; 30.XII.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:ProvinceState: E of Mahé, E coast of Sainte Anne Island

NIOP-E, Sta. 788: Seychelles, Alphonse atoll, SE part of lagoon; 7°02'S 52°44'E; reef flat and patch reefs, down to 8 m; snorkeling & scuba diving, transects 19 & 21; 4/6.i.93; in Pinctada margaritifera pearl-oysters.
NIOP-E, Sta. 764: Seychelles, S of D'Arros Island; 5°29'S 53°18'E; depth: 50-55 m; 1.2 m Agassiz trawl; 28.XII.1992; in Pteria aegyptiaca (Dillwyn, 1817) oyster.
